name: SkillsCafe
description: Skills Cafe believe that learners succeed when they experience highly engaging interventions that are designed and delivered using evidence-based practices. At Skills Cafe', our learners come first and we are obsessed about their success. Our team of highly specialized instructional designers, learning psychologists, graphic designers, game designers, and facilitators are all united by this single purpose - make learners successful. Our methodology is based on a simple set of principles built around this purpose.
features: Challenging existing mindset and ways of doing things through group processes and case studies
Exploring new ways of doing things, tools and techniques using guided processes and exercises
Practicing the newly learnt tools, techniques, methods through exercises, role-plays, and simulations
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: High impact learning journeys
ShortDescription: Skills Café is your reliable soft skills development partner. Our 130+ programs are delivered live through collaborative, games, serious games and group processes. All Skills Café programs are application-oriented with intensive pre and post workshop engagement and evaluation.
enhanced_description: Skills Cafe specializes in high-impact learning journeys focused on accelerating soft skill development and learning efficiency. They offer over 130 application-oriented programs, delivered live through highly engaging and evidence-based interventions. Their unique methodology incorporates collaborative group processes, case studies, guided exercises, role-plays, serious games, and simulations to challenge existing mindsets, explore new techniques, and facilitate practical application. The team comprises specialized instructional designers, learning psychologists, graphic designers, game designers, and facilitators, ensuring a learner-centric approach with intensive pre and post-workshop engagement and evaluation.
key_use_cases: Mindset transformation and challenging existing ways of doing things
Exploration and adoption of new tools and techniques
Practical application of learned skills through experiential methods like role-plays and simulations
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency within organizations
competitive_advantages: Leveraging highly engaging and evidence-based practices for interventions
A specialized team of instructional designers, learning psychologists, graphic designers, game designers, and facilitators
Extensive program library with over 130 distinct programs
Live program delivery incorporating collaborative learning, games, serious games, and group processes
Application-oriented learning with intensive pre and post-workshop engagement and evaluation
roi_benefits: Enhanced application and retention of skills
